title: Speaking Lab
welcome: Welcome to the Speaking Lab! Let's practice interviews and presentations.
instruction: Answer the questions clearly and confidently.

fields.prompt: Simulate an interview. Tell me about yourself in 30 seconds!
fields.hint: Hello, my name is Priya. I am studying computer science. I enjoy coding and solving problems. My hobbies are painting and reading novels.

fields.prompt: Give a mini-presentation about your hometown.
fields.hint: I come from Jaipur, a beautiful city known for its pink buildings and rich history. Tourists visit to see the forts, palaces, and local handicrafts. The food is also very delicious!

validation_logic.feedback_pass: Excellent! You spoke clearly and confidently.
